    • Method Detail

      • getNumRows

        public static int getNumRows(java.lang.String urlPath)
        Returns the number of rows that contain data in a CSV file.
        Parameters:
        urlPath - the URL to the CSV file on the web.
        Returns:
        the number of rows that contain data in the CSV file with location urlPath.

      • getNumCols

        public static int getNumCols(java.lang.String urlPath)
        Returns the number of columns that contain data in a CSV file.
        Parameters:
        urlPath - the URL to the CSV file on the web.
        Returns:

      • getRowOfNumbers

        public static double[] getRowOfNumbers(java.lang.String urlPath,
                                       int row)
        Returns an array of numbers that exist in a certain row of a CSV file.

        This method throws java.lang.NumberFormatException when the input column contains a character that cannot be converted into a double.

        Parameters:
        urlPath - the URL to the CSV file on the web.
        row - the input row number (0-based index logic).
        Returns:
        an array of numbers that exist in row row of the CSV file located at urlPath.

      • getColumnOfStrings

        public static java.lang.String[] getColumnOfStrings(java.lang.String urlPath,
                                                    int col)
        Returns an array of numbers that exist in a certain column of a CSV file.

        This method throws java.lang.NumberFormatException when the input column contains a character that cannot be converted into a double.

        Parameters:
        urlPath - the URL to the CSV file on the web.
        Returns:
        an array of numbers that exist in column col of the CSV file located at urlPath.

      • getColumnOfNumbers

        public static double[] getColumnOfNumbers(java.lang.String urlPath,
                                          int col)
        Returns an array of numbers that exist in a certain column of a CSV file.

        This method throws java.lang.NumberFormatException when the input column contains a character that cannot be converted into a double.

        Parameters:
        urlPath - the URL to the CSV file on the web.
        Returns:
        an array of numbers that exist in column col of the CSV file located at urlPath.
